articles.author: Cheyanne M. Daniels
articles.title: Rep. Mike Turner defends US strikes against ISIS targets in Nigeria - Politico
articles.description: Turner called the strikes a “continuation” of America's conflict with ISIS.
articles.content:
Turner added that the strikes were undertaken with the cooperation of the Nigerian government, which the Pentagon previously confirmed to POLITICO.
